exercises.name: Small Plank
exercises.description: Lie on your stomach, support yourself on your elbows and toes, keeping your body straight and hold the position for as long as possible.

exercises.name: Squat
exercises.description: Stand upright with feet shoulder-width apart, lower your hips towards the floor while keeping your back straight.

exercises.name: Bench Press
exercises.description: Lie on a flat bench, hold dumbbells in both hands, and push them upwards while maintaining a stable back.

exercises.name: Deadlift
exercises.description: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, bend your knees, and lift the barbell from the ground until your body is upright.

exercises.name: Burpees
exercises.description: Perform a squat, jump into a plank position, and then jump back up to standing position.

exercises.name: Sit-Ups
exercises.description: Lie on your back with knees bent, raise your upper body towards your knees.

exercises.name: Bicep Curls
exercises.description: Stand with dumbbells in both hands, bend your elbows and lift the weights while keeping your back straight.

exercises.name: Leg Press
exercises.description: Sit on the leg press machine, push the platform upwards while keeping your knees at a 90-degree angle.

exercises.name: Cable Chest Fly
exercises.description: Stand facing a cable machine, hold the handles in both hands and push the cables forward while keeping your back stable.

exercises.name: Cable Traps
exercises.description: Stand facing a cable machine, hold the handles in both hands and pull the cables down while keeping your shoulders stable.

exercises.name: Back Extension on Stability Ball
exercises.description: Lie on a stability ball with your feet on the floor and your back straight, then raise your hips to align with your upper body and core.

exercises.name: Triceps Dips
exercises.description: Sit on a bench or machine, lower your body while keeping your back straight, then push yourself back up.

exercises.name: Overhead Press
exercises.description: Hold dumbbells at shoulder height, press them upwards while keeping your back straight.

exercises.name: Pull-Up
exercises.description: Hang from a bar, pull your body upwards until your chin is above the bar.

exercises.name: Plank with Rotation
exercises.description: Hold a plank position on your elbows, rotate your upper body towards one hand while maintaining balance.
